resonances.name: High Voltage
resonances.description: Affected by Hydro for 40% less time. Superconduct, Overloaded, and Electro-Charged have a 100% chance to generate an Electro Elemental Particle (CD: 5s).

reactions.name: Overloaded
reactions.description: Causes an explosion that deals AoE Pyro DMG

reactions.name: Electro-Charged
reactions.description: Deals Electro DMG and high Poise Damage over time to all nearby targets with the Wet status.

reactions.name: Superconduct
reactions.description: Deals AoE Cryo DMG and reduces the Physical RES of enemies caught in the AoE by 40%.

reactions.name: Swirl
reactions.description: Deals AoE Electro DMG while spreading the Electro status to nearby enemies.

reactions.name: Crystallize
reactions.description: Creates an Electro shard. Picking it up creates an Electro shield around the character.

reactions.name: Quicken
reactions.description:
Applies a Quicken aura.
 Aggravate: Triggered when applying Electro to an entity with the Quicken aura. Adds Additive Base DMG Bonus to the attack that triggers this reaction.
 Spread: Triggered when applying Dendro to an entity with the Quicken aura. Adds Additive Base DMG Bonus to the attack that triggers this reaction.

reactions.name: Hyperbloom
reactions.description: Transforms a Dendro Core produced by the Bloom reaction into a homing Sprawling Shot that deals increased AoE Dendro DMG in a small radius.
